    "844e0972518d269499a32a2d4dddb46e85a9670c", 
    "2011-11-28T13%3A19%3A54GMT", 
    "http://s.media-imdb.com/twilight/?");

    type:"js",

});

    type:"swf",

<div id="pagecontent">







<div id="header"><h1>
 IMDb Charts: Top Movies  
 
</h1></div>

<div id="content-3">
	<div id="sidebar-narrow"> 
      

        
      
<style type="text/css">

<div id="main"><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="http://i.media-imdb.com/images/SFd72b6785a95f54162399860bfa11c6e0/css2/app/boxoffice/boxoffice.css" >
<div id="landing_blurb"><P>

Browse the most recent weekly U.S. box office summary, and find links to the top
box office performers, <a href="/boxoffice/rentals">top rentals</a>,
and much more -- including lists of the best (and worst) movies in all categories, voted on by our users.
<br>
<br/>
<a href="http://www.boxofficemojo.com" onClick="(new Image()).src='/ri/MOJO_CHARTS_IMAGE/TOP_BUCKET//images/b.gif?link=http://www.boxofficemojo.com';"><img style="margin-right: 10px;" align="left"  SRC="http://ia.media-imdb.com/media/imdb/01/I/41/71/35/10.gif" HEIGHT=33 WIDTH=118 BORDER=0></a>  Visit <a href="http://www.boxofficemojo.com" onClick="(new Image()).src='/ri/MOJO_CHARTS/TOP_BUCKET//images/b.gif?link=http://www.boxofficemojo.com';">Boxofficemojo.com</a> for box-office stats. <b><a href="https://secure.boxofficemojo.com/users/?page=upgrade-premier&ref=imdbchart" onClick="(new Image()).src='/ri/MOJO_BIZ_CHARTT/TOP_BUCKET//images/b.gif?link=https://secure.boxofficemojo.com/users/?page=upgrade-premier&ref=imdbchart';">Become a Mojo Premier member for even more advanced box-office reports!</a></b><br><br>




</p>
<br></div>

<table cellpadding=0 cellspacing=0 border=0 class="chart_meta">
<tr valign="top">
  <td id="starmeter">
    <span class="chart_title">STARmeter Top 10</span><br>
    <span class="chart_subtitle">week of 23 November 2011</span>
    <table cellpadding=4 cellspacing=0 border=0 width="100%" style="border-collapse: collapse">
    <colgroup>
      <col style="width:15px">
      <col style="width:10px">
      <col style="width:20px">
      <col style="width:auto">
    </colgroup>
    <tr class="chart_head">
      <th colspan="3" align="left">Rank</th>
